item.title: The FBI Ends Investigation of Kraken Founder and Returns Seized Devices
item.description: July 22nd. According to market intelligence, the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) has completed its investigation of the Kraken founder and has returned the seized equipment.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin Could Temporarily Dip to $115,000 to Test Support Level
item.description: On July 22nd, as per Cointelegraph, with Bitcoin surging to $122,000 and absorbing the majority of the obvious selling pressure, analyst AlphaBTC cautioned that the Bitcoin price might briefly drop to $115,000 to test the support level.The liquidity heatmap of Bitcoin indicates that the order book is prepared for this, with buy orders concentrated between $115,000 and $116,100.

item.title: Mercurity Fintech announced the initiation of a share repurchase plan of up to $10 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as per GlobeNewswire, Mercurity Fintech Holding Inc. declared the commencement of a share repurchase plan with a maximum value of $10 million. The purpose of this plan is to bolster confidence in its Solana and Bitcoin financial strategy and to increase shareholder value.

item.title: Consensys is planning to lay off 49 employees, representing approximately 7% of its total workforce.
item.description: On July 22nd, as reported by Bloomberg, software firm Consensys, which was founded by Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin, is currently in the process of planning to lay off 49 employees, which accounts for around 7% of its total workforce.A spokesperson for the company stated that this restructuring is intended to enhance overall profitability. Consensys recently acquired a startup with approximately 30 employees, and these employees will remain with the company. Meanwhile, the company still intends to continue recruiting for other positions. Consensys's largest office location is in Brooklyn.

item.title: PNC Partners with Coinbase to Provide Cryptocurrency Service Channel for Bank Customers
item.description: On July 22nd, as per Bloomberg, PNC Financial Services Group Inc. has entered into a partnership with cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global Inc. to establish a digital currency service channel for its bank customers.Emma Loftus, the Head of Cash Management at PNC Bank, indicated that the partnership is in its initial stage and is anticipated to initially be made available to wealth management and asset management clients, enabling them to conduct transactions in cryptocurrencies through their PNC accounts.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Dips Below $118,000
item.description: On July 22nd, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin dropped below $118,000 and is currently priced at $117,950, with a 24-hour decrease of 0.75%.

item.title: PENGU Surpasses $0.04, Surging Over 7% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 22nd, according to HTX market data, PENGU has exceeded $0.04 and is currently trading at $0.04065, with a 24-hour increase of 7.7%.

item.title: Solana Blockchain Meme Coin Memecoin Market Cap Briefly Surpasses $37 Million
item.description: On July 22nd, according to data from GMGN, the on-chain Meme coin of Solana briefly surged to a market capitalization of $37 million. Currently, it is at $29.5 million, with a 24-hour trading volume of $16.6 million and a 6-hour price increase of 81.96%.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and show large price fluctuations. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: NASDAQ extends intraday loss to 1%, S&P 500 now down 0.35%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market data, the intraday decline of the Nasdaq expanded to 1%, while the S&P 500 Index is currently down 0.35%. (Kryptonite)

item.title: Pendle Weekly Update: $55.9 Billion TVL Hits New All-Time High, Soaring Interest in Fixed Income Strategies
item.description: On July 22nd, Pendle's total value locked (TVL) for this week reached a new yearly peak, hitting $5.59 billion. Meanwhile, the total on lending platforms of Pendle PT exceeded $3 billion, with Aave holding the largest share, and the PT collateral totaling over $2.46 billion. The Pendle collateral scales for Morpho and Euler also reached $442 million and $67 million respectively, demonstrating the synchronous growth of Pendle's structured yield strategy across multiple protocols.The current market's focus on the PT-sUSDe (Sep 2025) annualized yield has risen to 11.11%. Since the returns from the July contract have been mostly released and the price is close to the principal, Pendle reminds users to migrate their funds to the September contract early to lock in their fixed income. Currently, on-chain data shows that approximately $1.9 billion is about to flow out of the July series and be redeployed, which is expected to dilute the new PT yield, making it a low-competition and high-yie
